    <metadata>

          <title>
            <string language="no">Trekant</string>
            <string language="en">Triangles</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dreiecke</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Triangles</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Triângulos</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Triangoli</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Τρίγωνα</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Triángulos</string>
          </title>
          <language>no</language>
          <description>
            <string language="no">Studer trekanter. Se gradene, arealet og omkretsen til forskjellige trekanter.</string>
            <string language="en">Study the triangles. Watch the degrees, the area and the circumference of the various triangles.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="no">trekanter</string>
            <string language="en">triangles</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="no">areal</string>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="no">omkrets</string>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="no">vinkler</string>
            <string language="en">angles</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>linear</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Studieren Sie die Dreiecke. Überwachen Sie 
die Grade, den Bereich und den Umkreis der verschiedenen Dreiecke.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Étudiez les triangles. Observez les 
degrés, la zone et la circonférence des diverses triangles.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Estude os triângulos. Preste atenção aos
graus, à área e à circunferência dos vários triângulos.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Studi i triangoli. Guardi i gradi, la zona e
la circonferenza di vari triangoli.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μελετήστε τα τρίγωνα. Προσέξτε τους βαθμούς, την
περιοχή και την περιφέρεια των διάφορων τριγώνων.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Estudie los triángulos. Mire los grados, 
el área y la circunferencia de los varios triángulos.</string>
          </description>

            <string language="x-mt-de">Dreiecke</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
